archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Correlate Resource Alarm Event Notifications
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Resource alarm event record correlation and filtering encompasses the correlation of redundant, transient or implied resource alarm event notifications with a specific â€œroot causeâ€� resource alarm event notification and associated resource alarm event record. This process correlates resource alarm event notifications to planned outage notifications to remove false resource alarm event notifications arising as a result of the planned outage activity.
